description: The Performance Ski Full Cushion Camo OTC brings a peek into your style while giving you all-day comfort. Along with the 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed-in fit and the Virtually Seamless™ toe that gives your toes a little extra room, this sock offers a wider welt for secure fit and comfort. Plus, its full-sock cushioning provides a day of extra protection and warmth. Along with your brain bucket, this responsibly sourced Merino wool sock will be the most important staple for all your downhill adventures.
name: Smartwool Performance Ski Full Cushion Camo Over The Calf Socks - Mens
